alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Carteret; Craven; Jones; Onslow; Pamlico (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 13 at 1:23AM EST until January 13 at 2:15AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Jones County in eastern North Carolina... Southeastern Craven County in eastern North Carolina... Eastern Onslow County in eastern North Carolina... South central Beaufort County in eastern North Carolina... Southwestern Carteret County in eastern North Carolina... Pamlico County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 215 AM EST. * At 123 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near James City to Onslow Beach, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Bern, Havelock, Morehead City, Newport, James City, Trent Woods, Stella, Swansboro, Hubert, Cape Carteret, Pine Knoll Shores, Harlowe, Silverdale, Florence, Broad Creek, Janeiro, Riverdale, Olympia, Whortonsville and Kuhns. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Carteret; Craven; Jones; Onslow; Pamlico
